trigger.action: curl -s --header 'Content-Type: text/plain' --request POST --data '$temperature$' http://192.168.1.9:8080/rest/items/Temp_Sensor_Out_Tujan; curl -s --header 'Content-Type: text/plain' --request POST --data '$humidity$' http://192.168.1.9:8080/rest/items/Humidity_Sensor_Out_Tujan

curl -s --header 'Content-Type: text/plain' --request POST --data '$temperature$' http://192.168.1.9:8080/rest/items/Temp_Sensor_In_Mainroom curl -s --header 'Content-Type: text/plain' --request POST --data '$humidity$' http://192.168.1.9:8080/rest/items/Humidity_Sensor_In_Mainroom
